Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Fire Temple#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #Dodongo's Cavern#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that ##the Thieves' Hideout## has #0# major items.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #the Hover Boots#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Whispering Walls Front Pot 1

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: Did you know that in the Forest Temple you can reach the alcove in the block push room with Hover Boots?

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #a Pouch of Silver Rupees for the Shadow Temple#.
hinted_locations: Ice Cavern Push Block Silver Rupee Red Ice
hinted_items: Silver Rupee Pouch (Shadow Temple Invisible Spikes)

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that a school of #stingers swallowed by Jabu Jabu# guard #Bombs (20 pieces)#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that plundering #the Lost Woods# is a foolish choice.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that in #Goron City# the hammer unlocks #a Pouch of Silver Rupees for the Gerudo Training Ground#.
hinted_items: Silver Rupee Pouch (Gerudo Training Ground Water)

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Recovery Heart#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that ##outside Ganon's Castle## has #1# major item.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Crater# is a foolish choice.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Bombchus (10 pieces)# can be found in #the Market#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Silver Rupee Center

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path of time.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Pouch of Silver Rupees for the Shadow Temple#.
hinted_items: Silver Rupee Pouch (Shadow Temple Scythe Shortcut)

LH (Lab).text: Please don't abandon this seed. Our world deserves saving!

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #riding the bean in Lake Hylia# leads to...^ #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)# and #Saria's Song#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Basement Silver Rupee Wood Beam Front

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that racing #Dampé's ghost# rewards...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: Did you know that you can access the Fire Temple boss door without dropping the pillar by using the Hover boots?

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that plundering #Kokiri Forest# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the path to #Phantom Ganon#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that a #fairy outside Ganon's Castle# holds #the Minuet of Forest#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that ##the Forest Temple## has #3# major items.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.
